sentences.en: Generally, each window of the interface has a distinctive look that will soon become recognizable.
sentences.cn: 一般来说, 程序的每个窗口都有着独特的外观,这样能很快地识别出来.

sentences.en: He was still recognizable, but he was not the same person any longer.
sentences.cn: 他的样子仍可以认得出来, 但他已不是原来那个人了.
她的声音一下子就能听出来。

sentences.en: If the application has a toolbar, It'should also be considered a recognizable signpost.
sentences.cn: 如果程序有工具栏, 那么也应该将其当做可识别的标志.

sentences.en: Mutual protection against wind is distinctly recognizable at the crown canopy.
sentences.cn: 在林冠层可以清楚地看到互相保护免遭风害的作用.

sentences.en: Perhaps her thickened, stiffened body was no longer recognizable from behind.
sentences.cn: 也许从背后已无法认出她的发胖僵硬的身子了.

sentences.en: That unfamiliar yet recognizable look was back again in Gatsby's face.
sentences.cn: 那种不熟悉可是认得出的表情又在盖茨比的脸上出现了.

sentences.en: The body was found to be well preserved, his features easily recognizable.
sentences.cn: 尸体保存完好，他的容貌特征清晰可辨。

sentences.en: The building was easily recognizable as a prison.
sentences.cn: 很容易看出这座建筑是所监狱。

sentences.en: The early counterfeit cards were crude and easily recognizable.
sentences.cn: 早期的伪卡都是粗制滥造的货色,很容易识别.

sentences.en: The original text has been modified so radically that it is barely recognizable.
sentences.cn: 原文改动得如此彻底,几乎面目全非.

sentences.en: The vault was opened and the body found to be well preserved, his features easily recognizable.
sentences.cn: 地窖被打开了, 尸体被发现保存完好, 他的面容很容易辨认。

sentences.en: They were recognizable by the poverty of their dress.
sentences.cn: 根据衣着寒酸这一点可以把他们认出来.

sentences.en: This situation produces recognizable stress symptoms.
sentences.cn: 这种情况产生一些容易认出的紧张症状.

sentences.en: This tree is always recognizable by its extremely beautiful silvery bark.
sentences.cn: 这种树很容易辨认，因为它有着非常漂亮的银色树皮。

sentences.en: This was a recognizable disaster to the German Air Force.
sentences.cn: 这对德国空军来说是一次明显的惨败.

words.tran_cn: 识别；承认，认出；重视；赞誉；公认
承认；认出；辨别（recognise的过去分词）
认识；意识到（recogniz的过去分词）
可辨认的；可认识的；可承认的

trans.tran_cn: 可识别的，可认识的，可承认的
trans.tran_en: If something can be easily recognized or identified, you can say that it is easily recognizable
